name: Attack
note: スキル1番は攻撃コマンドに対応します。

name: Defend
note: スキル2番は防御コマンドに対応します。

description:
The following is a frame for skills that you want to display above the
combat skills when the menu is opened.
name: -----Reserve

description: Performs consecutive attacks against a single enemy.
name: Combo Attack

description: Performs two attacks against a random single enemy.
name: Double Attack

description: Performs three attacks against a random single enemy.
name: Triple Attack

description: The user escapes from battle.
name: Escape

description: Observe the situation.
name: Observe

description: Absorbs HP from a single enemy.
name: Vampiric Drain

description: Recovers the user's HP.
name: Meditation

description: Stabs a single enemy with a paralyzing needle, causing paralysis.
name: Paralysis Needle

description: Deals damage to a single enemy and disrupts their balance.
name: Body Slam

description: Deals lightning attribute damage to a single enemy and causes paralysis.
name: Electric Shock

description: Covers a single enemy with mucus, reducing their agility.
name: Slime

description: Sprays venom on a single enemy, causing poison.
name: Poison Fluid

description: Stirs up the user's fighting spirit, enhancing abilities.
name: Roar

description: Absorbs MP from a single enemy.
name: Strange Dance

description: Glare at a single enemy, causing paralysis.
name: Paralyzing Glare

description: Inflicts darkness on a single enemy.
name: Blinding

description: Inflicts darkness on all enemies.
name: Sandstorm

description: Inflicts darkness on all enemies.
name: Flash

description: Poisons all enemies.
name: Deadly Poison Mist

description: Induces sleep in all enemies.
name: Lullaby

description: Charms all enemies.

description: Seals magic of all enemies.
name: Song of Silence

description: Confuses all enemies.
name: Ultrasonic Wave

description: Deals earth attribute damage to all enemies.
name: Stone Throw

description: Deals wind attribute damage to all enemies.
name: Scythe Whirlwind

description: Deals fire attribute damage to all enemies.
name: Fire Breath

description: Deals ice attribute damage to all enemies.
name: Ice Breath

description: Deals earth attribute damage to all enemies.
name: Earthquake

name: Tsunami

description: Cures a single ally of poison, paralysis, and sleep.

description: Revives a single ally from incapacitation.

description: Poisons all enemies.
